TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract XMLNodes implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 一个 对象集合，表示“XML 结构”任务窗格的树状视图（指示用户应用于文档的元素）中的节点。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the nodes in the tree view of the **XML Structure** task pane, which indicates the elements that a user has applied to a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示名称相同的 XML 元素的集合。The control represents a collection of XML elements with the same name. 当你在设计时将架构允许多次出现的元素映射到 Microsoft Office 的 Word 文档时, Visual Studio 将为元素创建。When you map elements that the schema allows to appear more than once onto a Microsoft Office Word document at design time, Visual Studio creates for the elements. 当元素的`maxOccurs`属性或元素的祖先设置为 > 1 时, 架构可以允许元素多次显示。A schema can allow an element to appear more than once when the `maxOccurs` attribute of the element or the element's ancestors is set to > 1. 如果架构将元素及其`maxOccurs`上级的特性设置为 1, 则 Visual Studio 将改为创建控件。If the schema sets the `maxOccurs` attribute for the element and its ancestors to 1, Visual Studio creates an control instead. 只能在设计时在 Word 文档级项目中创建控件。 controls can be created only in Word document-level projects at design time. 它们不能在运行时或在应用程序级项目中创建。They cannot be created at run time or in application-level projects. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control)和[如何:将 XMLNodes 控件添加到 Word](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnodes-controls-to-word-documents)文档。For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control) and [How to: Add XMLNodes Controls to Word Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnodes-controls-to-word-documents). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode Add (string Name, string Namespace, ref object Range);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode Add(string Name, string Namespace, object& Range) cil managed

param.name: Name
param.span: 在 Namespace 参数中指定的 XML 架构中的元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the element in the XML schema designated in the Namespace parameter.

param.span: 因为 XML 区分大小写，所以在 Namespace 参数中指定的元素的拼写必须和它在架构中显示的完全一致。

span.span: Because XML is case-sensitive, the spelling of the element specified in the Name parameter must be exactly as it appears in the schema.

param.span: 如果它与在 Namespace 参数中指定的架构中的任何一个元素名称都不匹配，则会显示一个错误。

span.span: If it does not match any of the element names in the schema specified in the Namespace parameter, an error is displayed.

param.name: Namespace
param.span: 在架构中定义的架构名称。

span.span: The name of the schema as defined in the schema.

param.span: Namespace 参数区分大小写并且必须和它在架构中显示的名称拼写完全一致。

span.span: The Namespace parameter is case-sensitive and must be spelled exactly as it appears in the schema.

param.span: 如果在附加到文档的任何架构中均无法找到指定的命名空间，则显示一个错误。

span.span: If the specified namespace cannot be found in any of the schemas attached to the document, an error is displayed.

param.name: Range
param.span: 要将该元素应用到的范围。

span.span: The range to which you want to apply the element.

param.span: 默认为将元素标记放在插入点处或选定内容的周围（如果选择了一段文本）。

span.span: The default is to place the element tags at the insertion point or around the selection if a text is selected.

summary.span: 获取一个表示新添加的元素的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that represents a newly added element.

returns.span: 一个表示新添加的元素的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents a newly added element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 在将从文档中删除并将其添加到文档中后, 代码将显示一个消息框。The code displays a message box before a is deleted from the document and after a is added to the document. 该示例还使用方法将一个新元素添加到集合中的指定范围, 并以编程方式引发该事件。The example also uses the method to add a new element to an collection at a specified range and programmatically raise the event. 此示例假设当前文档包含名`SampleInsertNodes`为的集合, 该集合具有名为 `SampleNode`的父项。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`, which has a parent named `SampleNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#200)]

summary.span: 在用户向集合或其子代之一添加新的 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user adds a new to the collection or to one of its descendents.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 在将从文档中删除并将其添加到文档中后, 代码将显示一个消息框。The code displays a message box before a is deleted from the document and after a is added to the document. 该示例还使用方法将一个新元素添加到集合中的指定范围, 并以编程方式引发该事件。The example also uses the method to add a new element to an collection at a specified range and programmatically raise the event. 此示例假设当前文档包含名`SampleInsertNodes`为的集合, 该集合具有名为 `SampleNode`的父项。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`, which has a parent named `SampleNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#200)]

summary.span: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 应用程序的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the Microsoft Office Word application.

value.span: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 应用程序的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the Microsoft Office Word application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性将活动应用程序窗口降到最低。The following code example uses the property to minimize the active application window. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`InsertMemoToNodes`的控件。This example assumes that the current document contains an control named `InsertMemoToNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当用户从集合中删除 或子代节点时，在该控件被删除之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user deletes a or descendent node from the collection, before the control is deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数为`true`, 则不应更改文档中的 XML。 `InUndoRedo`If the `InUndoRedo` parameter is `true`, you should not change the XML in the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 在将从文档中删除并将其添加到文档中后, 代码将显示一个消息框。The code displays a message box before a is deleted from the document and after a is added to the document. 该示例还使用方法将一个新元素添加到集合中的指定范围, 并以编程方式引发该事件。The example also uses the method to add a new element to an collection at a specified range and programmatically raise the event. 此示例假设当前文档包含名`SampleInsertNodes`为的集合, 该集合具有名为 `SampleNode`的父项。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`, which has a parent named `SampleNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#200)]

summary.span: 当光标从节点上下文以外的区域移入 集合的节点或子代节点之一时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside one of the nodes or descendant nodes of the collection, from an area outside of the context of the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 仅在上下文发生更改时引发 事件,并且可以为在同一层次结构级别上嵌套的多个控件引发。The event is raised only when the context changes and can be raised for multiple controls nested at the same hierarchical level. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control)。For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了、 、 和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会将双线添加到所选内容的边框上, 或根据事件删除双线。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会显示消息, 指出新选定节点和以前选择的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的集合。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#201](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#201)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#201](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#201)]

summary.span: 当光标从 集合的节点或子代节点之一移到原始节点上下文以外的区域时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is moved from one of the nodes or descendant nodes of the collection, to an area outside of the context of the original node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 仅在上下文发生更改时引发 事件,并且可以为在同一层次结构级别上嵌套的多个控件引发。The event is raised only when the context changes and can be raised for multiple controls nested at the same hierarchical level. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control)。For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了、 、 和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会将双线添加到所选内容的边框上, 或根据事件删除双线。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会显示消息, 指出新选定节点和以前选择的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的集合。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#201](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#201)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#201](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#201)]

summary.span: 获取 集合中项的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来显示集合中的项数。The following code example uses the property to display the number of items in an collection. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的控件。This example assumes that the current document contains an control named `SampleInsertNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取在其中创建 控件的应用程序。

span.span: Gets the application in which the control was created.

value.span: 在其中创建 控件的应用程序。

span.span: The application in which the control was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于集合是在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建的, 因此该属性返回十六进制数 4D535744, 它表示字符串 "MSWD"。Because the collection was created in Microsoft Office Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." 此值还可以由常数表示。This value can also be represented by the constant . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来显示控件是否是在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建的。The following code example uses the property to display whether an control was created in Microsoft Office Word. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`InsertMemoToNodes`的控件。This example assumes that the current document contains an control named `InsertMemoToNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#3)]

summary.span: 当光标从 集合的节点之一移出时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is moved out of one of the nodes of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control)。For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了、 、 和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会将双线添加到所选内容的边框上, 或根据事件删除双线。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会显示消息, 指出新选定节点和以前选择的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的集合。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#201](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#201)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#201](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#201)]

summary.span: 获取 控件的枚举器。

span.span: Gets the enumerator for the control.
The enumerator for the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法获取集合的枚举器, 然后循环访问该集合。The following code example uses the method to get an enumerator for an collection and then iterate through the collection. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的控件。This example assumes that the current document contains an control named `SampleInsertNodes`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNodes#100](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/CS/ThisDocument.cs#100)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNodes#100](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNodes/VB/ThisDocument.vb#100)]

summary.span: 获取一个 ，它表示 控件的基础本机对象。

span.span: Gets a that represents the underlying native object for the control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 控件的基础本机对象。

span.span: A that represents the underlying native object for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将控件传递给需要基础对象 (a ) 的方法或属性。You cannot pass a control to a method or property that expects the underlying object (a ). 必须使用 控件的属性来访问基础。You must use the property of the control to access the underlying . 然后, 将此对象传递到需要的方法或属性。You then pass this object to a method or property that expects a . 有关更多信息，请参见 [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls)。For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls).

param.name: Index
param.span: 指示要检索的节点的位置。

span.span: Indicates the position of the node that you want to retrieve.

summary.span: 获取位于指定索引处的 。

span.span: Gets the at the specified index.
The at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回对象, 而不是控件。 The property returns a object rather than a control. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls)。For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性获取集合中的第一个。The following code example uses the property to get the first in an collection. 该示例在指定集合的特定索引时隐式使用属性。The example uses the property implicitly when a specific index of the collection is specified. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的控件。This example assumes that the current document contains an control named `SampleInsertNodes`. span.span: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside one of the nodes of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control)。For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了、 、 和事件的事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会将双线添加到所选内容的边框上, 或根据事件删除双线。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 引发和事件时, 事件处理程序会显示消息, 指出新选定节点和以前选择的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`SampleInsertNodes`的集合。This example assumes that the current document contains an collection named `SampleInsertNodes`. summary.span: 当在 控件中存在验证错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is a validation error in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 "**针对附加架构验证文档**" 选项, 则会为集合中的每个无效元素引发此事件。If the **Validate document against attached schema** option is set, this event is raised for every invalid element in the collection.
